org.apache.flink.metrics.ganglia

类 GangliaReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.dropwizard.ScheduledDropwizardReporter
      • org.apache.flink.metrics.ganglia.GangliaReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, CharacterFilter, MetricReporter, Scheduled

    @PublicEvolving
public class GangliaReporter
extends ScheduledDropwizardReporter
    This class acts as a factory for the GangliaReporter and allows using it as a Flink reporter.
